name: Anchora
description:
Anchora, is a single-player, 2D side-scrolling platformer. The game is set in a fantasy jungle and temple ruins of unknown origin. The player takes control of an unnamed character, whose task is to venture through trap-ridden locales in seek of treasure.

The player is able to run, jump and grapple onto appropriate objects using their trusty grappling hook. The player can use this hook on a variety of objects for traversal; from standard terrain to moving hooks.
